text: kaho, "kya tumhaare thaharae saajheedaaron mein koee hai jo saty kee or maargadarshan kare?" kaho, "allaah hee saty ke maarg par chalaata hai. phir jo saty kee or maargadarshan karata ho, vah isaka zyaada haqadaar hai ki usaka anusaran kiya jae ya vah jo svayan hee maarg na pae jab tak ki use maarg na dikhaaya jae? phir yah tumhen kya ho gaya hai, tum kaise faisale kar rahe ho
